steps.title: Prepare starter (morning)
steps.description:
Feed starter 1:2:2 in the morning
Let ferment 3-4 hours at room temperature
Use just before peak: domed, full of bubbles, spoonful floats on water

steps.title: Mix dough (midday or evening)
steps.description:
In large mixing bowl thoroughly mix FLOUR and MALTED MILK powder
Add WATER and STARTER
Let rest 30 minutes

steps.title: Add SALT
steps.description:
Dampen hands first. Mix until just incorporated (I add a layer, fold, repeat until all salt is folded in, then mix by hand
Dough will feel sticky, but manageable
Let rest 30 minutes

steps.title: 4-way fold (1)
steps.description:
Stretch and fold, rotate 90 degrees and repeat 3 times for a total of four folds.
Dough should double and feel aerated - like a slightly jiggly belly
